channel.title: 677+ help

item.title: 677+ help
item.dc:creator: @scampz scampz
item.description:
@scampz wrote:

I added using charms on obelisk for XP but I want it so it takes Shards out of your inventory too and won’t let you use the Charm on the Obelisk unless there’s enough of the right items (1 blue charm + 50 Spirit shards)

} else if (itemId == 12163 && object.getId() == 28716) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(12163, 1); player.getSkills().addXp(23, 22D);

That’s the starting code (to use Charms on the Obelisk)

} else if (itemId == 12163*18016 && object.getId() == 28716) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(12163, 1*18016, 50); player.getSkills().addXp(23, 22D);

Then I added *18016 (which was fine in the first line) then in the second line I get an error with “.deleteItem” and I try to correct it, it takes me to Inventory.java

public void deleteItem(int itemId, int amount, int i) { if (!player.getControlerManager() .canDeleteInventoryItem(itemId, amount)) return;

It’s asking me to change the “int” but I don’t know what to do to make this work so any help would be appreciated, thanks.

Read full topic
